00030 template < unsigned BlkSize_ >
00031 class bid_vector : public std::vector < BID < BlkSize_ > >
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     enum
00035     { block_size = BlkSize_ };
00036     typedef bid_vector < block_size > _Self;
00037     typedef std::vector < BID < BlkSize_ > >_Derived;
00038     typedef unsigned size_type;
00039 
00040     bid_vector (size_type _sz) : _Derived (_sz)
00041     { }
00042 };

00061 template < typename Tp_, typename AllocStr_, typename SzTp_, typename DiffTp_,
00062           unsigned BlkSize_, typename PgTp_, unsigned PgSz_ >
00063 class vector_iterator
00064 {
00065     typedef vector_iterator < Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_,
00066                              BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_ > _Self;
00067     typedef const_vector_iterator < Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_,
00068                                    BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_ > _CIterator;
00069 
00070     friend class const_vector_iterator < Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_>;
00071 public:
00072     typedef _CIterator const_iterator;
00073     typedef _Self iterator;
00074 
00075     typedef SzTp_ size_type;
00076     typedef DiffTp_ difference_type;
00077     typedef unsigned block_offset_type;
00078     typedef vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_, AllocStr_, SzTp_> vector_type;
00079     friend class vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_, AllocStr_, SzTp_>;
00080     typedef bid_vector < BlkSize_ > bids_container_type;
00081     typedef typename bids_container_type::iterator bids_container_iterator;
00082     typedef typed_block<BlkSize_, Tp_> block_type;
00083     typedef BID< BlkSize_ > bid_type;
00084 
00085     typedef std::random_access_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00086     typedef typename vector_type::value_type value_type;
00087     typedef typename vector_type::reference reference;
00088     typedef typename vector_type::const_reference const_reference;
00089     typedef typename vector_type::pointer pointer;
00090     typedef typename vector_type::const_pointer const_pointer;
00091 
00092     enum { block_size = BlkSize_ };
00093 
00094 protected:
00095     size_type offset;
00096     vector_type * p_vector;
00097 private:
00098     vector_iterator (vector_type * v, size_type o) : offset (o),
00099                                                      p_vector (v)
00100     { }
00101 public:
00102     vector_iterator () : offset (0), p_vector (NULL) { }
00103     vector_iterator (const _Self & a) :
00104         offset (a.offset),
00105         p_vector (a.p_vector) { }
00106 
00107     block_offset_type block_offset () const
00108     {
00109         return static_cast < block_offset_type >
00110                (offset % block_type::size);
00111     }
00112     bids_container_iterator bid () const
00113     {
00114         return p_vector->bid (offset);
00115     }
00116 
00117     difference_type operator - (const _Self & a) const
00118     {
00119         return offset - a.offset;
00120     }
00121 
00122     difference_type operator - (const const_iterator & a) const
00123     {
00124         return offset - a.offset;
00125     }
00126 
00127     _Self operator - (size_type op) const
00128     {
00129         return _Self(p_vector, offset - op);
00130     }
00131 
00132     _Self operator + (size_type op) const
00133     {
00134         return _Self(p_vector, offset + op);
00135     }
00136 
00137     _Self & operator -= (size_type op)
00138     {
00139         offset -= op;
00140         return *this;
00141     }
00142 
00143     _Self & operator += (size_type op)
00144     {
00145         offset += op;
00146         return *this;
00147     }
00148 
00149     reference operator *()
00150     {
00151         return p_vector->element(offset);
00152     }
00153 
00154     pointer operator ->()
00155     {
00156         return &(p_vector->element(offset));
00157     }
00158 
00159     const_reference operator *() const
00160     {
00161         return p_vector->const_element(offset);
00162     }
00163 
00164     const_pointer operator ->() const
00165     {
00166         return &(p_vector->const_element(offset));
00167     }
00168 
00169     reference operator [] (size_type op)
00170     {
00171         return p_vector->element(offset + op);
00172     }
00173 
00174     const_reference operator [] (size_type op) const
00175     {
00176         return p_vector->const_element(offset + op);
00177     }
00178 
00179     void touch()
00180     {
00181         p_vector->touch(offset);
00182     }
00183 
00184     _Self & operator ++()
00185     {
00186         offset++;
00187         return *this;
00188     }
00189     _Self operator ++(int)
00190     {
00191         _Self __tmp = *this;
00192         offset++;
00193         return __tmp;
00194     }
00195     _Self & operator --()
00196     {
00197         offset--;
00198         return *this;
00199     }
00200     _Self operator --(int)
00201     {
00202         _Self __tmp = *this;
00203         offset--;
00204         return __tmp;
00205     }
00206     bool operator == (const _Self &a) const
00207     {
00208         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00209         return offset == a.offset;
00210     }
00211     bool operator != (const _Self &a) const
00212     {
00213         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00214         return offset != a.offset;
00215     }
00216     bool operator < (const _Self &a) const
00217     {
00218         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00219         return offset < a.offset;
00220     }
00221     bool operator > (const _Self &a) const
00222     {
00223         return a < *this;
00224     }
00225 
00226     bool operator == (const const_iterator &a) const
00227     {
00228         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00229         return offset == a.offset;
00230     }
00231     bool operator != (const const_iterator &a) const
00232     {
00233         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00234         return offset != a.offset;
00235     }
00236     bool operator < (const const_iterator &a) const
00237     {
00238         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00239         return offset < a.offset;
00240     }
00241     bool operator > (const const_iterator &a) const
00242     {
00243         return a < *this;
00244     }
00245 
00246     void flush()
00247     {
00248         p_vector->flush();
00249     }
00250     /*
00251        std::ostream & operator<< (std::ostream & o) const
00252        {
00253             o << "vectorpointer: "  << ((void*)p_vector) <<" offset: "<<offset;
00254             return o;
00255        }*/
00256 };

00259 template < typename Tp_, typename AllocStr_, typename SzTp_, typename DiffTp_,
00260           unsigned BlkSize_, typename PgTp_, unsigned PgSz_ >
00261 class const_vector_iterator
00262 {
00263     typedef const_vector_iterator < Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_,
00264                                    BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_ > _Self;
00265     typedef vector_iterator < Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_,
00266                              BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_ > _NonConstIterator;
00267 
00268     friend class vector_iterator < Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_ >;
00269 public:
00270     typedef _Self const_iterator;
00271     typedef _NonConstIterator iterator;
00272 
00273     typedef SzTp_ size_type;
00274     typedef DiffTp_ difference_type;
00275     typedef unsigned block_offset_type;
00276     typedef vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_, AllocStr_, SzTp_> vector_type;
00277     friend class vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_, AllocStr_, SzTp_>;
00278     typedef bid_vector < BlkSize_ > bids_container_type;
00279     typedef typename bids_container_type::iterator bids_container_iterator;
00280     typedef typed_block<BlkSize_, Tp_> block_type;
00281     typedef BID< BlkSize_ > bid_type;
00282 
00283     typedef std::random_access_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00284     typedef typename vector_type::value_type value_type;
00285     typedef typename vector_type::reference reference;
00286     typedef typename vector_type::const_reference const_reference;
00287     typedef typename vector_type::pointer pointer;
00288     typedef typename vector_type::const_pointer const_pointer;
00289 
00290     enum { block_size = BlkSize_ };
00291 
00292 protected:
00293     size_type offset;
00294     const vector_type * p_vector;
00295 private:
00296     const_vector_iterator (const vector_type * v, size_type o) : offset (o),
00297                                                                  p_vector (v)
00298     { }
00299 public:
00300     const_vector_iterator () : offset (0), p_vector (NULL)
00301     { }
00302     const_vector_iterator (const _Self & a) :
00303         offset (a.offset),
00304         p_vector (a.p_vector) { }
00305 
00306     const_vector_iterator (const iterator & a) :
00307         offset (a.offset),
00308         p_vector (a.p_vector) { }
00309 
00310     block_offset_type block_offset () const
00311     {
00312         return static_cast < block_offset_type >
00313                (offset % block_type::size);
00314     }
00315     bids_container_iterator bid () const
00316     {
00317         return ((vector_type *)p_vector)->bid (offset);
00318     }
00319 
00320     difference_type operator - (const _Self & a) const
00321     {
00322         return offset - a.offset;
00323     }
00324 
00325     difference_type operator - (const iterator & a) const
00326     {
00327         return offset - a.offset;
00328     }
00329 
00330     _Self operator - (size_type op) const
00331     {
00332         return _Self(p_vector, offset - op);
00333     }
00334 
00335     _Self operator + (size_type op) const
00336     {
00337         return _Self(p_vector, offset + op);
00338     }
00339 
00340     _Self & operator -= (size_type op)
00341     {
00342         offset -= op;
00343         return *this;
00344     }
00345 
00346     _Self & operator += (size_type op)
00347     {
00348         offset += op;
00349         return *this;
00350     }
00351 
00352     const_reference operator *() const
00353     {
00354         return p_vector->const_element(offset);
00355     }
00356 
00357     const_pointer operator ->() const
00358     {
00359         return &(p_vector->const_element(offset));
00360     }

00363     {
00364         return p_vector->const_element(offset + op);
00365     }

00368     {
00369         p_vector->touch(offset);
00370     }
00371 
00372     _Self & operator ++()
00373     {
00374         offset++;
00375         return *this;
00376     }
00377     _Self operator ++(int)
00378     {
00379         _Self tmp_ = *this;
00380         offset++;
00381         return tmp_;
00382     }
00383     _Self & operator --()
00384     {
00385         offset--;
00386         return *this;
00387     }

00389     {
00390         _Self __tmp = *this;
00391         offset--;
00392         return __tmp;
00393     }
00394     bool operator == (const _Self &a) const
00395     {
00396         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00397         return offset == a.offset;                 // or (offset + stxxl::int64(p_vector))
00398     }
00399     bool operator != (const _Self &a) const
00400     {
00401         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00402         return offset != a.offset;
00403     }
00404     bool operator < (const _Self &a) const
00405     {
00406         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00407         return offset < a.offset;
00408     }
00409 
00410     bool operator == (const iterator &a) const
00411     {
00412         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00413         return offset == a.offset; // or (offset + stxxl::int64(p_vector))
00414     }
00415     bool operator != (const iterator &a) const
00416     {
00417         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00418         return offset != a.offset;
00419     }
00420     bool operator < (const iterator &a) const
00421     {
00422         assert(p_vector == a.p_vector);
00423         return offset < a.offset;
00424     }
00425 
00426     void flush()
00427     {
00428         p_vector->flush();
00429     }
00430 
00431     std::ostream & operator<< (std::ostream & o) const
00432     {
00433         o << "vectorpointer: " << ((void *)p_vector) << " offset: " << offset;
00434         return o;
00435     }
00436 };

00440 
00453 template <
00454           typename Tp_,
00455           unsigned PgSz_ = 4,
00456           typename PgTp_ = lru_pager<8>,
00457           unsigned BlkSize_ = STXXL_DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE (Tp_),
00458           typename AllocStr_ = STXXL_DEFAULT_ALLOC_STRATEGY,
00459           typename SzTp_ = stxxl::uint64 // will be deprecated soon
00460 >
00461 class vector
00462 {
00463 public:
00464     typedef Tp_ value_type;
00465     typedef value_type & reference;
00466     typedef const value_type & const_reference;
00467     typedef value_type * pointer;
00468     typedef SzTp_ size_type;
00469     typedef stxxl::int64 difference_type;
00470     typedef const value_type * const_pointer;
00471 
00472     typedef PgTp_ pager_type;
00473     typedef AllocStr_ alloc_strategy;
00474 
00475     enum {
00476         block_size = BlkSize_,
00477         page_size = PgSz_,
00478         n_pages = pager_type::n_pages,
00479         on_disk = -1
00480     };
00481 
00482     typedef vector_iterator < value_type, alloc_strategy, size_type,
00483                              difference_type, block_size, pager_type, page_size > iterator;
00484     friend class vector_iterator < value_type, alloc_strategy, size_type, difference_type, block_size, pager_type, page_size >;
00485     typedef const_vector_iterator < value_type, alloc_strategy,
00486                                    size_type, difference_type, block_size, pager_type, page_size > const_iterator;
00487     friend class const_vector_iterator < value_type, alloc_strategy, size_type, difference_type, block_size, pager_type, page_size >;
00488 
00489     typedef bid_vector < block_size > bids_container_type;
00490     typedef typename bids_container_type::
00491     iterator bids_container_iterator;
00492     typedef typename bids_container_type::
00493     const_iterator const_bids_container_iterator;
00494 
00495     typedef typed_block<BlkSize_, Tp_> block_type;
00496 
00497 
00498 private:
00499     alloc_strategy _alloc_strategy;
00500     size_type _size;
00501     bids_container_type _bids;
00502     //bids_container_iterator _bids_finish;
00503     mutable pager_type pager;
00504 
00505     enum { uninitialized = 1, dirty = 2 };
00506     mutable std::vector<unsigned char> _page_status;
00507     mutable std::vector<int_type> _last_page;
00508     mutable simple_vector<int_type> _page_no;
00509     mutable std::queue<int_type> _free_pages;
00510     mutable simple_vector<block_type> _cache;
00511     file * _from;
00512     block_manager * bm;
00513     config * cfg;
00514 
00515     size_type size_from_file_length(stxxl::uint64 file_length)
00516     {
00517         stxxl::uint64 blocks_fit = file_length / stxxl::uint64(block_type::raw_size);
00518         size_type cur_size = blocks_fit * stxxl::uint64(block_type::size);
00519         stxxl::uint64 rest = file_length - blocks_fit * stxxl::uint64(block_type::raw_size);
00520         return (cur_size + rest / stxxl::uint64(sizeof(value_type)));
00521     }
00522     stxxl::uint64 file_length()
00523     {
00524         size_type cur_size = size();
00525         if (cur_size % size_type(block_type::size))
00526         {
00527             stxxl::uint64 full_blocks_length = size_type(_bids.size() - 1) * size_type(block_type::raw_size);
00528             size_type rest = cur_size - size_type(_bids.size() - 1) * size_type(block_type::size);
00529             return full_blocks_length + rest * size_type(sizeof(value_type));
00530         }
00531         return size_type(_bids.size()) * size_type(block_type::raw_size);
00532     }
00533 public:
00534     vector (size_type n = 0) :
00535         _size (n),
00536         _bids (div_and_round_up (n, block_type::size)),
00537         _page_status(div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size)),
00538         _last_page(div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size)),
00539         _page_no(n_pages),
00540         _cache(n_pages * page_size),
00541         _from(NULL)
00542     {
00543         bm = block_manager::get_instance ();
00544         cfg = config::get_instance ();
00545 
00546         int_type all_pages = div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size);
00547         int_type i = 0;
00548         for ( ; i < all_pages; ++i)
00549         {
00550             _page_status[i] = uninitialized;
00551             _last_page[i] = on_disk;
00552         }
00553 
00554         for (i = 0; i < n_pages; ++i)
00555             _free_pages.push(i);
00556 
00557 
00558 
00559         bm->new_blocks (_alloc_strategy, _bids.begin (),
00560                         _bids.end ());
00561     }
00562 
00563     void swap(vector & obj)
00564     {
00565         std::swap(_alloc_strategy, obj._alloc_strategy);
00566         std::swap(_size, obj._size);
00567         std::swap(_bids, obj._bids);
00568         std::swap(pager, obj.pager);
00569         std::swap(_page_status, obj._page_status);
00570         std::swap(_last_page, obj._last_page);
00571         std::swap(_page_no, obj._page_no);
00572         std::swap(_free_pages, obj._free_pages);
00573         std::swap(_cache, obj._cache);
00574         std::swap(_from, obj._from);
00575     }
00576     size_type capacity() const
00577     {
00578         return size_type(_bids.size()) * block_type::size;
00579     }
00580     void reserve(size_type n)
00581     {
00582         if (n <= capacity())
00583             return;
00584 
00585 
00586         unsigned_type old_bids_size = _bids.size();
00587         unsigned_type new_bids_size = div_and_round_up (n, block_type::size);
00588         unsigned_type new_pages = div_and_round_up(new_bids_size, page_size);
00589         _page_status.resize(new_pages, uninitialized);
00590         _last_page.resize(new_pages, on_disk);
00591 
00592         _bids.resize(new_bids_size);
00593         if (_from == NULL)
00594             bm->new_blocks(offset_allocator < alloc_strategy > (old_bids_size, _alloc_strategy),
00595                            _bids.begin() + old_bids_size, _bids.end());
00596 
00597         else
00598         {
00599             size_type offset = size_type(old_bids_size) * size_type(block_type::raw_size);
00600             bids_container_iterator it = _bids.begin() + old_bids_size;
00601             for ( ; it != _bids.end(); ++it, offset += size_type(block_type::raw_size) )
00602             {
00603                 (*it).storage = _from;
00604                 (*it).offset = offset;
00605             }
00606             STXXL_VERBOSE1("vector::reserve(): Changing size of file " << ((void *)_from) << " to "
00607                                                                        << offset);
00608             _from->set_size(offset);
00609         }
00610     }
00611     void resize(size_type n)
00612     {
00613 #ifndef STXXL_FREE_EXTMEMORY_ON_VECTOR_RESIZE
00614         reserve(n);
00615 #else
00616         unsigned_type old_bids_size = _bids.size();
00617         unsigned_type new_bids_size = div_and_round_up (n, block_type::size);
00618 
00619 
00620         if (new_bids_size > old_bids_size)
00621         {
00622             reserve(n);
00623         }
00624         else if (new_bids_size < old_bids_size)
00625         {
00626             bm->delete_blocks(_bids.begin() + new_bids_size, _bids.end());
00627             _bids.resize(new_bids_size);
00628 
00629             unsigned_type first_page_to_evict = div_and_round_up(new_bids_size, page_size);
00630             std::fill(_page_status.begin() + first_page_to_evict,
00631                       _page_status.end(), 0); // clear dirty flag, so this pages
00632                                               // will be never written
00633         }
00634 #endif
00635 
00636         _size = n;
00637     }
00638     void clear()
00639     {
00640         _size = 0;
00641         bm->delete_blocks(_bids.begin(), _bids.end());
00642 
00643         _bids.clear();
00644         _page_status.clear();
00645         _last_page.clear();
00646         while (!_free_pages.empty())
00647             _free_pages.pop();
00648 
00649 
00650         for (int_type i = 0; i < n_pages; ++i)
00651             _free_pages.push(i);
00652     }
00653     void push_back(const_reference obj)
00654     {
00655         size_type old_size = _size;
00656         resize(old_size + 1);
00657         element(old_size) = obj;
00658     }
00659     void pop_back()
00660     {
00661         resize(_size - 1);
00662     }
00663     reference back()
00664     {
00665         return element(_size - 1);
00666     }
00667     reference front()
00668     {
00669         return element(0);
00670     }
00671     const_reference back() const
00672     {
00673         return const_element(_size - 1);
00674     }
00675     const_reference front() const
00676     {
00677         return const_element(0);
00678     }
00685     vector (file * from) :
00686         _size(size_from_file_length(from->size())),
00687         _bids(div_and_round_up(_size, size_type(block_type::size))),
00688         _page_status(div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size)),
00689         _last_page(div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size)),
00690         _page_no(n_pages),
00691         _cache(n_pages * page_size),
00692         _from(from)
00693     {
00694         // initialize from file
00695         assert(from->get_disk_number() == -1);
00696 
00697         if (block_type::has_filler)
00698         {
00699             std::ostringstream str_;
00700             str_ << "The block size for the vector, mapped to a file must me a multiple of the element size (" <<
00701             sizeof(value_type) << ") and the page size (4096).";
00702             throw std::runtime_error(str_.str());
00703         }
00704 
00705         bm = block_manager::get_instance ();
00706         cfg = config::get_instance ();
00707 
00708         int_type all_pages = div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size);
00709         int_type i = 0;
00710         for ( ; i < all_pages; ++i)
00711         {
00712             _page_status[i] = 0;
00713             _last_page[i] = on_disk;
00714         }
00715 
00716         for (i = 0; i < n_pages; ++i)
00717             _free_pages.push(i);
00718 
00719 
00720 
00721         size_type offset = 0;
00722         bids_container_iterator it = _bids.begin();
00723         for ( ; it != _bids.end(); ++it, offset += size_type(block_type::raw_size) )
00724         {
00725             (*it).storage = from;
00726             (*it).offset = offset;
00727         }
00728         from->set_size(offset);
00729     }
00730 
00731     vector(const vector & obj) :
00732         _size (obj.size()),
00733         _bids (div_and_round_up (obj.size(), block_type::size)),
00734         _page_status(div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size)),
00735         _last_page(div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size)),
00736         _page_no(n_pages),
00737         _cache(n_pages * page_size),
00738         _from(NULL)
00739     {
00740         bm = block_manager::get_instance ();
00741         cfg = config::get_instance ();
00742 
00743         int_type all_pages = div_and_round_up (_bids.size(), page_size);
00744         int_type i = 0;
00745         for ( ; i < all_pages; ++i)
00746         {
00747             _page_status[i] = uninitialized;
00748             _last_page[i] = on_disk;
00749         }
00750 
00751         for (i = 0; i < n_pages; ++i)
00752             _free_pages.push(i);
00753 
00754 
00755         bm->new_blocks (_alloc_strategy, _bids.begin (),
00756                         _bids.end ());
00757 
00758         const_iterator inbegin = obj.begin();
00759         const_iterator inend = obj.end();
00760         std::copy(inbegin, inend, begin());
00761     }
00762 
00763     vector & operator = (const vector & obj)
00764     {
00765         if (&obj != this)
00766         {
00767             vector tmp(obj);
00768             this->swap(tmp);
00769         }
00770         return *this;
00771     }
00772 
00773     size_type size () const
00774     {
00775         return _size;
00776     }
00777     bool empty() const
00778     {
00779         return (!_size);
00780     }
00781     iterator begin ()
00782     {
00783         return iterator (this, 0);
00784     }
00785     const_iterator begin () const
00786     {
00787         return const_iterator (this, 0);
00788     }
00789     iterator end ()
00790     {
00791         return iterator (this, _size);
00792     }
00793     const_iterator end () const
00794     {
00795         return const_iterator (this, _size);
00796     }
00797     reference operator [] (size_type offset)
00798     {
00799         return element(offset);
00800     }
00801     const_reference operator [] (size_type offset) const
00802     {
00803         return const_element(offset);
00804     }
00805 
00806     void flush() const
00807     {
00808         simple_vector<bool> non_free_pages(n_pages);
00809         int_type i = 0;
00810         for ( ; i < n_pages; i++)
00811             non_free_pages[i] = true;
00812 
00813 
00814         while (!_free_pages.empty())
00815         {
00816             non_free_pages[_free_pages.front()] = false;
00817             _free_pages.pop();
00818         }
00819 
00820         for (i = 0; i < n_pages; i++)
00821         {
00822             _free_pages.push(i);
00823             int_type page_no = _page_no[i];
00824             if (non_free_pages[i])
00825             {
00826                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("vector: flushing page " << i << " address: " << (int64(page_no) *
00827                                                                                  int64(block_type::size) * int64(page_size)));
00828                 if (_page_status[page_no] & dirty)
00829                     write_page(page_no, i);
00830 
00831 
00832                 _last_page[page_no] = on_disk;
00833                 _page_status[page_no] = 0;
00834             }
00835         }
00836     }
00837     ~vector()
00838     {
00839         try
00840         {
00841             flush();
00842         }
00843         catch (...)
00844         {
00845             STXXL_VERBOSE("An exception in the ~vector()");
00846         }
00847 
00848         bm->delete_blocks(_bids.begin(), _bids.end());
00849 
00850         if (_from)        // file must be truncated
00851         {
00852             STXXL_VERBOSE1("~vector(): Changing size of file " << ((void *)_from) << " to "
00853                                                                << file_length());
00854             STXXL_VERBOSE1("~vector(): size of the vector is " << size());
00855             _from->set_size(file_length());
00856         }
00857     }
00858 private:
00859     bids_container_iterator bid (const size_type & offset)
00860     {
00861         return (_bids.begin () +
00862                 static_cast < typename bids_container_type::size_type >
00863                 (offset / block_type::size));
00864     }
00865     const_bids_container_iterator bid (const size_type & offset) const
00866     {
00867         return (_bids.begin () +
00868                 static_cast < typename bids_container_type::size_type >
00869                 (offset / block_type::size));
00870     }
00871     void read_page(int_type page_no, int_type cache_page) const
00872     {
00873         STXXL_VERBOSE1("vector " << this << ": reading page_no=" << page_no << " cache_page=" << cache_page);
00874         request_ptr * reqs = new request_ptr [page_size];
00875         int_type block_no = page_no * page_size;
00876         int_type last_block = STXXL_MIN(block_no + page_size, int_type(_bids.size()));
00877         int_type i = cache_page * page_size, j = 0;
00878         for ( ; block_no < last_block; ++block_no, ++i, ++j)
00879         {
00880             reqs[j] = _cache[i].read(_bids[block_no]);
00881         }
00882         assert(last_block - page_no * page_size > 0);
00883         wait_all(reqs, last_block - page_no * page_size);
00884         delete [] reqs;
00885     }
00886     void write_page(int_type page_no, int_type cache_page) const
00887     {
00888         STXXL_VERBOSE1("vector " << this << ": writing page_no=" << page_no << " cache_page=" << cache_page);
00889         request_ptr * reqs = new request_ptr [page_size];
00890         int_type block_no = page_no * page_size;
00891         int_type last_block = STXXL_MIN(block_no + page_size, int_type(_bids.size()));
00892         int_type i = cache_page * page_size, j = 0;
00893         for ( ; block_no < last_block; ++block_no, ++i, ++j)
00894         {
00895             reqs[j] = _cache[i].write(_bids[block_no]);
00896         }
00897         assert(last_block - page_no * page_size > 0);
00898         wait_all(reqs, last_block - page_no * page_size);
00899         delete [] reqs;
00900     }
00901     reference element(size_type offset)
00902     {
00903         int_type page_no = offset / (block_type::size * page_size);
00904         int_type page_offset = offset % (block_type::size * page_size);
00905         assert(page_no < int_type(_last_page.size()) );                 // fails if offset is too large, out of bound access
00906         int_type last_page = _last_page[page_no];
00907         if (last_page < 0)                 // == on_disk
00908         {
00909             if (_free_pages.empty())                    // has to kick
00910             {
00911                 int_type kicked_page = pager.kick();
00912                 pager.hit(kicked_page);
00913                 int_type old_page_no = _page_no[kicked_page];
00914                 _last_page[page_no] = kicked_page;
00915                 _last_page[old_page_no] = on_disk;
00916                 _page_no[kicked_page] = page_no;
00917 
00918                 // what to do with the old page ?
00919                 if (_page_status[old_page_no] & dirty)
00920                 {
00921                     // has to store changes
00922                     write_page(old_page_no, kicked_page);
00923                 }
00924 
00925                 if (_page_status[page_no] != uninitialized)
00926                 {
00927                     read_page(page_no, kicked_page);
00928                 }
00929 
00930                 _page_status[page_no] = dirty;
00931 
00932                 return _cache[kicked_page * page_size + page_offset / block_type::size][page_offset % block_type::size];
00933             }
00934             else
00935             {
00936                 int_type free_page = _free_pages.front();
00937                 _free_pages.pop();
00938                 pager.hit(free_page);
00939                 _last_page[page_no] = free_page;
00940                 _page_no[free_page] = page_no;
00941 
00942                 if (_page_status[page_no] != uninitialized)
00943                 {
00944                     read_page(page_no, free_page);
00945                 }
00946 
00947                 _page_status[page_no] = dirty;
00948 
00949                 return _cache[free_page * page_size + page_offset / block_type::size][page_offset % block_type::size];
00950             }
00951         }
00952         else
00953         {
00954             _page_status[page_no] = dirty;
00955             pager.hit(last_page);
00956             return _cache[last_page * page_size + page_offset / block_type::size][page_offset % block_type::size];
00957         }
00958     }
00959     void touch(size_type offset) const
00960     {
00961         // fails if offset is too large, out of bound access
00962         assert(offset / (block_type::size * page_size) < _page_status.size() );
00963         _page_status[offset / (block_type::size * page_size)] = 0;
00964     }
00965     const_reference const_element(size_type offset) const
00966     {
00967         int_type page_no = offset / (block_type::size * page_size);
00968         int_type page_offset = offset % (block_type::size * page_size);
00969         assert(page_no < int_type(_last_page.size()) );                 // fails if offset is too large, out of bound access
00970         int_type last_page = _last_page[page_no];
00971         if (last_page < 0)                 // == on_disk
00972         {
00973             if (_free_pages.empty())                    // has to kick
00974             {
00975                 int_type kicked_page = pager.kick();
00976                 pager.hit(kicked_page);
00977                 int_type old_page_no = _page_no[kicked_page];
00978                 _last_page[page_no] = kicked_page;
00979                 _last_page[old_page_no] = on_disk;
00980                 _page_no[kicked_page] = page_no;
00981 
00982                 // what to do with the old page ?
00983                 if (_page_status[old_page_no] & dirty)
00984                 {
00985                     // has to store changes
00986                     write_page(old_page_no, kicked_page);
00987                 }
00988 
00989                 if (_page_status[page_no] != uninitialized)
00990                 {
00991                     read_page(page_no, kicked_page);
00992                 }
00993 
00994                 _page_status[page_no] = 0;
00995 
00996                 return _cache[kicked_page * page_size + page_offset / block_type::size][page_offset % block_type::size];
00997             }
00998             else
00999             {
01000                 int_type free_page = _free_pages.front();
01001                 _free_pages.pop();
01002                 pager.hit(free_page);
01003                 _last_page[page_no] = free_page;
01004                 _page_no[free_page] = page_no;
01005 
01006                 if (_page_status[page_no] != uninitialized)
01007                 {
01008                     read_page(page_no, free_page);
01009                 }
01010 
01011                 _page_status[page_no] = 0;
01012 
01013                 return _cache[free_page * page_size + page_offset / block_type::size][page_offset % block_type::size];
01014             }
01015         }
01016         else
01017         {
01018             pager.hit(last_page);
01019             return _cache[last_page * page_size + page_offset / block_type::size][page_offset % block_type::size];
01020         }
01021     }
01022 };
01023 
01024 template <
01025           typename Tp_,
01026           unsigned PgSz_,
01027           typename PgTp_,
01028           unsigned BlkSize_,
01029           typename AllocStr_,
01030           typename SzTp_ >
01031 inline bool operator == ( stxxl::vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01032                                          AllocStr_, SzTp_ > & a,
01033                           stxxl::vector<Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01034                                         AllocStr_, SzTp_> & b )
01035 {
01036     return a.size() == b.size() && std::equal(a.begin(), a.end(), b.begin());
01037 }
01038 
01039 template <
01040           typename Tp_,
01041           unsigned PgSz_,
01042           typename PgTp_,
01043           unsigned BlkSize_,
01044           typename AllocStr_,
01045           typename SzTp_ >
01046 inline bool operator != ( stxxl::vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01047                                          AllocStr_, SzTp_ > & a,
01048                           stxxl::vector<Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01049                                         AllocStr_, SzTp_> & b )
01050 {
01051     return !(a == b);
01052 }
01053 
01054 template <
01055           typename Tp_,
01056           unsigned PgSz_,
01057           typename PgTp_,
01058           unsigned BlkSize_,
01059           typename AllocStr_,
01060           typename SzTp_ >
01061 inline bool operator < ( stxxl::vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01062                                         AllocStr_, SzTp_ > & a,
01063                          stxxl::vector<Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01064                                        AllocStr_, SzTp_> & b )
01065 {
01066     return std::lexicographical_compare(a.begin(), a.end(), b.begin(), b.end());
01067 }
01068 
01069 template <
01070           typename Tp_,
01071           unsigned PgSz_,
01072           typename PgTp_,
01073           unsigned BlkSize_,
01074           typename AllocStr_,
01075           typename SzTp_ >
01076 inline bool operator > ( stxxl::vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01077                                         AllocStr_, SzTp_ > & a,
01078                          stxxl::vector<Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01079                                        AllocStr_, SzTp_> & b )
01080 {
01081     return b < a;
01082 }

01089           typename AllocStr_,
01090           typename SzTp_ >

01092                                          AllocStr_, SzTp_ > & a,
01093                           stxxl::vector<Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01094                                         AllocStr_, SzTp_> & b )

01102           typename PgTp_,
01103           unsigned BlkSize_,
01104           typename AllocStr_,
01105           typename SzTp_ >
01106 inline bool operator >= ( stxxl::vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01107                                          AllocStr_, SzTp_ > & a,
01108                           stxxl::vector<Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_,
01109                                         AllocStr_, SzTp_> & b )

01143 template
01144 <
01145  typename Tp_,
01146  unsigned PgSz_ = 4,
01147  unsigned Pages_ = 8,
01148  unsigned BlkSize_ = STXXL_DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE (Tp_),
01149  typename AllocStr_ = STXXL_DEFAULT_ALLOC_STRATEGY,
01150  pager_type Pager_ = lru
01151 >
01152 struct VECTOR_GENERATOR
01153 {
01154     typedef typename IF < Pager_ == lru,
01155     lru_pager<Pages_>, random_pager<Pages_> > ::result PagerType;
01156 
01157     typedef vector<Tp_, PgSz_, PagerType, BlkSize_, AllocStr_> result;
01158 };

01166 namespace std
01167 {
01168     template <
01169               typename Tp_,
01170               unsigned PgSz_,
01171               typename PgTp_,
01172               unsigned BlkSize_,
01173               typename AllocStr_,
01174               typename SzTp_ >
01175     void swap( stxxl::vector < Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_, AllocStr_, SzTp_ > & a,
01176                stxxl::vector<Tp_, PgSz_, PgTp_, BlkSize_, AllocStr_, SzTp_> & b )
01177     {
01178         a.swap(b);
01179     }
01180 }
